title: Cognitive Load-Optimized Multimedia-Based University English Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English reading comprehension skills and familiarity with basic professional terminology
context.additional_context: Digital device-equipped environment for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze specialized English texts with over 80% comprehension using multimedia materials designed according to CLTML principles.
Learners can process information with a 30% reduction in cognitive load in a multimodal learning environment integrating video, infographics, etc.
Learners can successfully perform two or more English communication strategies applicable to real-world tasks through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
